data.text: Yahweh gave to me, Jeremiah the prophet, a message about Babylon city and the country of Babylonia.
This is what Yahweh says:
The army of a nation will come from the north to attack Babylon
“But I, Yahweh, say that in the future, when that is about to happen,
They will inquire about the road to Jerusalem,
My people have been like [MET] lost sheep.
All their enemies who found them attacked them.
But now, I say to the leaders of my people, ‘Flee from Babylon!
Do that because I am going to gather an army of great nations to the north of Babylon.
Babylonia will be conquered,
“You people of Babylon who ◄plundered/stole everything valuable from► my chosen people,
But soon your people will be very disgraced [DOU] as a result of being conquered.
Because I, Yahweh, am angry with you people of Babylon,
All you nations that surround Babylon,
Shout war-cries against Babylon from all sides of the city.
Take away from Babylon those who plant crops
“The Israeli people are like [MET] sheep
So this is what I, the Commander of the armies of angels, the God whom the Israeli people worship, say:
And I will bring the people of Israel back to their own land
At that time, there will not be people in Israel and in Judah who are still guilty for having sinned [DOU],
“So, I, Yahweh, say to the enemies of Babylonia,‘Attack the people who live in the Merathaim region
Shout your battle cries throughout the land;
The army of Babylon is like [MET] the most powerful hammer on the earth,
You people of Babylon, listen,
It is as though I have opened the place where I store my weapons,
So, you enemies of Babylonia, come from distant lands and attack it.
Destroy all the young men who are as strong as [MET] bulls;
Listen to the people who have fled and escaped from Babylon
Summon archers [DOU] to come to attack Babylon;
The young men of Babylon will fall in the streets;
I, the Commander of the armies of angels, say this:
Your land is full of proud people,
I, the Commander of the armies of angels, also say this:
But I am strong, and I will free them.
I will send enemy soldiers carrying swords [PRS] to strike the people of Babylonia;
They will strike their false prophets with swords
They will strike their horses and chariots
I will cause the streams to become dry.
Soon only hyenas and other wild creatures will live there;
I will destroy Babylon like I destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah and the nearby towns;
Look! A great army will come from the north.
Their army has bows and arrows and spears;
The King of Babylon says,
I, Yahweh, will come to Babylon suddenly like a lion comes out of the jungle
Listen to what I have planned to do to the people of Babylon city and the rest of Babylonia:
When Babylon is destroyed, the noise will be extremely loud,
